name: 陳紅章
objective:
偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.
schedule:
Week 1 : Matrix Algebra and Solution of Matrix Equations 
 Introduction 
 Program Gauss - Gaussian Elimination Method 

Week 2-3 : Exact, Least-Squares, and Spline Curve-Fits 
 Introduction 
Program LeastSq1 — Linear Least-Squares Curve-Fit
 Program LeastSqG — Generalized Least-Squares Curve-Fit

Week 4-6: Roots of Polynomial and Transcendental Equations 
Introduction 
Iterative Methods and Program Roots
 Program NewRaphG — Generalized Newton-Raphson Iterative Method

Week 7-8:  Finite Differences, Interpolation, and Numerical Differentiation

Week 9:  Midterm test 

Week 10-12 : Numerical Integration and Program Volume

Week 13- 15:  Ordinary Differential Equations — Initial and Boundary 
Value Problems
Introduction 
Application of Runge-Kutta Method for Solving InitialValue Problems 
Application of Runge-Kutta Method for Solving Boundary Value Problems 

Weel 16-17: Partial Differential Equations 
Numerical Solution of Parabolic Partial Differential Equations 
Solving Elliptical Partial Differential Equations 

Week 18 : Final Presentation
scorePolicy:
Programming assignments and exercises: 30%

Group project and presentation: 40%
